TopicTitle: Lurker decided to let himself be known

Articles.Content:
Been lurking on these forums for many months now. Can\'t decide why I didn\'t join earlier , since KSP Is a very fun game. Anyways , Decided to let myself be known.

You now have 1+ Kerbal space forummer...

Yeah.

Also , what is it with all the territory claims?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Captain Sordid

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

(Arise my copycat minions!)
Excellent, not the only lurker to have decided that it\'s time to get round to registering 8)

Also , what is it with all the territory claims?

The forumites are restless and playing at war on an unclaimable and officialy unnamed map with weapons that can\'t hurt their enemies. Basically highspirits and shouting.

I expect that things will return to the normal crashing and random explosions once Squad and HarvesteR are returned from the holiday.

Welcome to the forums!

The forumites are restless and playing at war on an unclaimable and officialy unnamed map with weapons that can\'t hurt their enemies. Basically highspirits and shouting.

I expect that things will return to the normal crashing and random explosions once Squad and HarvesteR are returned from the holiday.

Welcome to the forums!

Its not all just ripping each other\'s opinions apart, so far every nation has come to peace and most are within the Kerbal Council, a kind of like a kerbal UN.

Plus be glad we did this, it\'s controlling the military sides greatly and impacting who can do what and when.

Then again, it\'s like dungeons and dragons 8)

I wonder who will ally with one of the countries with veto and pretend to be Israel?

Because as much as I don\'t hate Jews, Israel\'s behaviour since its formation has been quite abominable. It bombed a UN compound, killing a large number of civilians. And it claims Arab land because \'God said its theirs\'. Well that\'s what Allah told the Muslims. Doesn\'t mean its any less valid. And since its invalid anyway, and the only reason Israel is still a UN country is because its the only country in the Middle East who has good relations with America, and America can veto and pull economic strings until the cows come home.

And the cows are currently drifting off into space.

...that means Israel won\'t be leaving the UN any time soon.

I wonder who will ally with one of the countries with veto and pretend to be Israel?

Because as much as I don\'t hate Jews, Israel\'s behaviour since its formation has been quite abominable. It bombed a UN compound, killing a large number of civilians. And it claims Arab land because \'God said its theirs\'. Well that\'s what Allah told the Muslims. Doesn\'t mean its any less valid. And since its invalid anyway, and the only reason Israel is still a UN country is because its the only country in the Middle East who has good relations with America, and America can veto and pull economic strings until the cows come home.

And the cows are currently drifting off into space.

...that means Israel won\'t be leaving the UN any time soon.

Why do you believe everything your television says?

Israel has only defended itself, it started no war besides the six days war which was also to defend itself, claimed territory and gave it all back.

I suggest you learn some facts before going with this ridicules argument everyone else uses.

Is a forum Introduction thread really a place to start an Argument about world politics?

Well , unless it\'s kerbal politics...

Mallow234 said:

Is a forum Introduction thread really a place to start an Argument about world politics?

welcome to KSP!
